attributes.action: Tony Foulds, Sheffield for an MBE for his sterling work with crew of Mi Amigo
attributes.background: Mr Tony Foulds has been a champion of the crew of B17 Mi Amigo over the last 60 + years, he ought to be recognised for his work in this regard.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
